mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IDMS_ACCESS_LOG ( USERNAME, USER_IP, LOGIN_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{userIp}, #{loginDttm} )
mapper.select: SELECT USERNAME, USER_IP, LOGIN_DTTM, LOGOUT_DTTM FROM IDMS_ACCESS_LOG WHERE LOGIN_DTTM BETWEEN CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CAST(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AS DATE), '%Y%m%d'), '000000') AND CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CAST(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AS DATE), '%Y%m%d'), '235959') ORDER BY LOGIN_DTTM

SELECT USERNAME , USER_IP , LOGIN_DTTM , LOGOUT_DTTM FROM IDMS_ACCESS_LOG WHERE LOGIN_DTTM BETWEEN CONCAT(TO_CHAR(CAST(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AS DATE), 'YYYYMMDD'), '000000') AND TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /* now for test */ ORDER BY LOGIN_DTTM
